adjective.description: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a volcano; volcanic; = "Vulcanian".

origin: Mid 17th century; earliest use found in George Havers (fl. 1665). Variant of Vulcanian, partly (i) after classical Latin Volcānius, variant of Vulcānius of or associated with Vulcan, partly (ii) after French volcanien volcanic, and partly (iii) (especially in later use) after volcano.
